Sentencas: Direct n-octane combustion is demonstrated with a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) with a porous nickel and yttria-stabilized zirconia (Ni-YSZ) cermet anode.
Titulo: Reactions on Ni-YSZ cermet anode of solid oxide fuel cells during internal steam reforming of n-octane

Sentencas: We systematically investigate the influences of the steam/carbon ratio (S/C) and the cell temperature on the internal steam reforming reaction and the electrochemical reaction on the anode by evaluating short-term power generation.
Titulo: Reactions on Ni-YSZ cermet anode of solid oxide fuel cells during internal steam reforming of n-octane

Sentencas: The n-octane is fully reformed to H-2, CO, C, CO2, CH4, and/or C2H6 by internal steam reforming, and is considered a suitable fuel for obtaining high yields of H-2 and CO, which are important for achieving high power generation efficiency.
Titulo: Reactions on Ni-YSZ cermet anode of solid oxide fuel cells during internal steam reforming of n-octane

Sentencas: However, very little deposited carbon is consumed, and the carbon deposition is not suppressed even under the maximum power generation conditions at 950 degrees C and an S/C ratio of 1.0.
Titulo: Reactions on Ni-YSZ cermet anode of solid oxide fuel cells during internal steam reforming of n-octane

Sentencas: At an S/C ratio of more than 1.0, the open-circuit voltage and power generation are unstable.
Titulo: Reactions on Ni-YSZ cermet anode of solid oxide fuel cells during internal steam reforming of n-octane

Sentencas: In addition, the concentration overpotential is remarkably large, resulting in a decrease in the power density.
Titulo: Reactions on Ni-YSZ cermet anode of solid oxide fuel cells during internal steam reforming of n-octane
